metadata.name: Custom Stage API
metadata.description:
[h1]Repentance Stage API[/h1]
It's an API for making custom stages.
Built from scratch to replace Revelations' StageAPI. Incompatible with old Revelations, needed for new version.
Special thanks to the artists whose floors make up the thumbnail!
HappyHead - Cove, Bottom Right Origami - Crystal Caves, Bottom Left Ashkal - Glacier and Tomb, Top
If you're looking for the Afterbirth+ version of StageAPI, it can be found [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2498098491]here[/url].
For developers, a more up to date version of StageAPI can be found at [url=https://github.com/Meowlala/BOIStageAPI15]our Github repository.[/url] Please report any issues you find there!
